title: Overrated
review: This movie is so dumb, not at all scary, completely ridiculous and the ending totally unsatisfying

title: Nothing happens
review: This movie is absolutely pointless, nothing interesting, stupid story, who in their right mind would stick around after watching 2 people jump off a cliff...
